# rovr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rovr is to provide a stand alone package for analyzing ROV transect data and generating density estimates of yelloweye rockfish in southeast Alaska. 

## Installation

```{r, eval = F}
# Install devtools 
install.packages("devtools")

# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("commfish/rovr")

# load the library
library(rovr)
```
